Reviews.Title: cheap poor  cables
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: This 125 feet cable is extremely thin and cheap. I bought 2 of these extensions to work with the Q-See High Resolution Weatherproof CCD Camera. The cables are very thin, slightly thicker then a toothpick. This horrible cable carries very blurry video image and lost signal. I spent hours of extra time installing these poor cables that I could have been doing something else with all because of that cheap cable!

ProductInfo.Features:
All-in-one video and power cable
Plug and Play ready
2 Pack of 125 feet video/power cables in white
ProductInfo.Name: 2 Pack of 125ft 125 Feet All-In-One Siamese CCTV Security Camera BNC Video and Power Cable for Surveillance System
